ygData.subject: Re: HARMSHIELD what lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: do you need a component to cast it?   Cus I put it in my spell slot but it stays grey like I had just cast it! what is up w/ that? ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
do you need a component to cast it? Cus I put it in my spell slot but it
stays grey like I had just cast it! what is up w/ that?

----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 3:42 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] HARMSHIELD what lvl?


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 7/6/99 3:37:57 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> mata_eq@... writes:
>
> > Can anyone tell me what is a good use for harmshield? Can I cast after
I
> > cast this spell?
>
> Running away. It gives you 18 seconds to run :) No you cannot cast while
it
> is up.
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder.
